title: How to Make Hung Curd

steps.headline: Tie fresh curdled curd tightly in muslin or cheesecloth.
Hang the tied ball for draining water / liquids out.
steps.description: Draining over a sink or bowl is best.

steps.headline: Wait at least four hours to ensure full draining.
Press the bundle as if you were making a cheese similar to a cottage cheese.
You may use a weight on the drained curds to press even more moisture out.
Your curds are now WELL HUNG and will last a long time without souring.

text: Tie fresh curdled curd tightly in muslin or cheesecloth.  Hang the tied ball for draining water / liquids out. Draining over a sink or bowl is best. Wait at least four hours to ensure full draining.  Take down the bundle.  Press the bundle as if you were making a cheese similar to a cottage cheese.  You may use a weight on the drained curds to press even more moisture out.  Your curds are now WELL HUNG and will last a long time without souring.  Store in a bowl.
